title: HIVEMIND HULLO:  Griz & Adrian Stumpp
description:
A HIVEMIND HULLO Virtually Not Alone Network Event

Stumpps has dropped on a few livestreams before, but here's your chance to get to know Adrian a little better as he and General Grizwald Gaius Grim disuss the VIllage & The Hero's Journey

The Book skillfully unspoken of:  https://www.amazon.com/Crows-Head-Chemical-Marriage-ebook/dp/B09WNQFK5R/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=the+crow%27s+head&sr=8-1

Adrian speaking about the Book:  /watch?v=99MnI3djlRg

@jeanjaque73 Pale Fire Promo:  /watch?v=Q73Ofl-696g

Shadow Cabal Energy Transfer:  
https://donate.stripe.com/fZebJuciu1xe1P2fYY

Shadow Cabal Goose Hoodie:
 https://www.etsy.com/au/listing/1340501337/there-is-no-agency-unisex-zipper-hoodie

Howdy Rascal Baseball Tee:
https://www.etsy.com/au/listing/1401078187/howdy-rascal-raglan-baseball-tee-34

Goose & Rascal Artistry:
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

Check out the Channel's Community Tab!
There's a Discord for people who don't hate: https://discord.gg/FGBtG7rM

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
